text.p: Boca Research Inc said on Wednesday that it shipped its first Boca 56K Internet modems, with full-production shipments expected to begin later this month.
The modems enable end-users to download information from the Internet over local telephone lines at speeds up to 56 kilobits per second.
Boca's modems are expected to retail in the $149 to $169 range.
Boca Reseach makes data communications, video-conferencing, multimedia and networking products.
